subject: Task Completion - Role Management Features
content:
Successfully implemented all role management features:

✅ Role Editing - Full modal with name, color, permissions, power level editing
✅ Role Deletion - Confirmation dialog + automatic user demotion
✅ Role Reordering - Drag-drop with Matrix API persistence
✅ Removed all console.log placeholders

All acceptance criteria met. Changes committed (9aa17e8). Ready for verification.
